QuestData.Title: Our Boy Wants To Be A Skyguard Ranger
QuestData.Description: $C, we've got a problem -- we have lots of sons. And ever since the Skyguard moved in nearby, all our sons ever talk about is joining their ranks.$B$BAs a proud father, we want them to have every advantage for when they apply. So, would you go to the fel crystalforge at either forge camp to the north or south, and procure a magic flask for our sons? You can't miss their green smoke.$B$BWe think that they take ten apexis shards to make. We'd give you the shards, but we don't have any at the moment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect an Unstable Flask of the Beast.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have that magic flask, yet? It will mean the world to little Torkus Jr.
QuestData.RewardText: You're a lifesaver, $n. Our boys are going to be so excited to hear the news!$B$BOK, so one down and one to go. We did tell you about the other magical flask that they're going to need, didn't we?
